name: Planet Chaos
description:
Hey guys this is my first game jam, hope you like the game. Also a big thanks to my sister for helping me with a lot of sprites. Make sure to follow her here:

https://www.pixilart.com/martha10

what I used is:

game engine: unity version 2020.2.0f1

sprites: pixil art

Warning: The first file you see (Archiver) isn't the game it isn't workring properly.

How To Play

Move with: W A S D

Recharge with E

Avoid planets and the enemy fireballs

And if you take damage, power ups will fall to heal you try to catch them.

NOTE: The game has a issue with the enemy fireballs if you downloaded in winodws, the go very slow, il try to fix it in the future.

Edit: I think I fixed it now but still not so sure. Try to play both of windows files (if you are on windows).

Another NOTE: If you on mac and when you open the app is shows the error:

"This application is damaged" follow this 2 minute tutorial:
